fields.name: Unknown Keyword
fields.description: The used keyword is not defined in the system.

fields.name: Unknown Clinic
fields.description: The Clinic provided FOSAID does not exist in the system.

fields.name: Unknown Reporter
fields.description: The reporter is not registered, he needs to be registered at the health centre before he can send the report.

fields.name: Invalid Date
fields.description: The date is wrong, the format is dd.mm.yyyy

fields.name: Invalid ID
fields.description: The national is not valid, it must be 16 digits, from the Rwandan NID ISO. if it is not available, also any given ID must be 16 digits.

fields.name: Invalid Action Code
fields.description: The provided Action Code is not defined in the system.

fields.name: Invalid Location Code
fields.description: More than one locations of the incident (home, route, facility)

fields.name: Incomplete Report
fields.description: The report sent is incomplete, some of mandatory, required information is missing.

fields.name: Invalid Information
fields.description: Some of the information provided is incorrect. (Ex: Responding to AMB call of a mother who is not yet registered in the system.)

fields.name: Duplicate Report
fields.description: Reporter is sending a report that exists already in the system.

fields.name: Missing Report
fields.description: Notification for a missing report. (ex: sending ANC, PNC without respectively Pregnancy and Birth reports)
